rooms.description: Spacious hall with Vastu-aligned north-east entrance to welcome positive energy. Adjacent to garden view.
Large open-plan living area with integrated kitchen, designed for maximum natural light and ventilation. South facing for energy balance.
Adjacent to the living room with seamless connection, features built-in storage.
Luxurious suite with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; located in north-east quadrant for auspiciousness.
Spacious bedroom with east facing windows to receive morning sunlight.
Well-ventilated bedroom with south facing aspect for cooling.
Balanced room with west orientation ensuring comfortable evenings.
Additional guest bedroom with flexible space, located towards the central area of ground floor for easy access.
Dedicated service area integrated on the side; includes small living and sleeping area with a compact bathroom. Designed to ensure privacy while meeting building norms.
Separate guest washroom facility for convenience, located near main bedroom suite.

openings.description: Aligns with Vastu principles and ensures auspicious energy flow. Large arched door for style and grandeur.
Connects the interior to the expansive garden, promoting natural light and cross-ventilation.
Provided for additional outdoor space and relaxation.
